      static BigInteger PaillierCipher.add_plaintext(BigInteger ciphertext, BigInteger plaintext, PaillierPublicKey pk)
      returns the sum of the Paillier encrypted evidence and plaintext value Note: The result is still encrypted Warning: If the sum exceeds N, it gets modded by N

      Compute ciphertext = g^{m}r^{n} (mod n^2)
